sentence: The pool area was fantastic for a get together after our games
Nice pool area with hot tub
The pool and fitness center where also clean
We had access to a heated pool hot tub laundry and a computer
Rooms nicely decorated beds and bedding are nice quiet rooms pool was good lots of cable channels staff was nice food was godLocation is in the heart of downtown
pool area is nice with many loungers
Very nice stay staff was excellent liked the workout room great pool
The pool and patio area was very relaxing and the restaurant was nice as well
the room is great The gym and pool area are more then adequate
I did not use the pool but i could see it from my room and it looked clean and in good condition
Nice patio too to have a drink on that you bring yourself as there is no service while the kids swim
The only problem was that the pool was extremely cold
The pool area was ok but none of the wicker furniture in the covered shade had cushions so I was not able to sit outside long
Although the jacuzi was broken the second night I used it
The pool was closed which I was only notified a couple days before so no time to make other arrangements
Why in the world does the pool close at 10 pm
However hot tub and pool were dirty and per front desk hot tub jets have n’t worked in weeks
I found that the water tends to pool in the middle and you can clearly see it ’s an older tub
also do not get a room overlooking the pool
also screaming kids in the pool until 10pm so a little more consideration to non convention guests

My opinion and observation yours can vary If you want peace and quite avoid the rooms overlooking the pool they have kids in it yelling past 1030 pm our room was disgusting h2o leaking from the ceiling toilet backed up and sent water all over the floor smelled like sewer soon after heater was not working the hotel apologized and took ownership and moved us to another room parking is a mess lot fills up quick
